**Prepping v0.4.2 for release - should be available within an hour or two**

**[v0.4.2 Released](https://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/kerballoons-v0-4-2) for KSP 1.2**

**Changelog**

    -Recompiled for KSP 1.2
    -Added parachutes specifically designed for the KerBalloons
    -Added 0.625m and 3.75m versions of the stock service bays
    -Improved colliders
    -Minor changes to part descriptions

Note: There is currently no '1.2' option on the list of compatible KSP versions on kerbal.curseforge so I have had to just choose 1.2prerelease - It does work with the official 1.2 release and will update the download page when the option is available
